targets.rawSql:
with price_1d as (
  select --chain, 
    oracle_id,
    time_bucket('1d', datetime) as datetime,
    avg(usd_value) as avg_usd_value
  FROM data_raw.oracle_price_ts
  where oracle_id in (
    'WETH', -- arbitrum
    'WETH', -- aurora
    'AVAX', -- avax
    'WBNB', -- bsc
    'CELO', -- celo
    'WCRO', -- cronos
    'ROSE', -- emerald
    'WFTM', -- fantom
    'WFUSE', -- fuse
    'ONE', -- harmony
    'WHT', -- heco
    'METIS', -- metis
    'WGLMR', -- moonbeam
    'MOVR', -- moonriver
    'WETH', -- optimism
    'WMATIC', -- polygon
    'WSYS' -- syscoin
  )
  and $__timeFilter(datetime)
  group by 1, 2
),
usd_by_chain_ts as (
    SELECT h.datetime, h.chain, 
        sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value) as strategist_amount,
        sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.86) * avg(avg_usd_value) as bifi_stakers_amount,
        sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.14) * avg(avg_usd_value) as bifi_treasury_amount
    FROM
    data_raw.vault_harvest_1d_ts h
        left join price_1d p on p.datetime = h.datetime and p.oracle_id = 
            case 
                when h.chain = 'arbitrum' then 'WETH'
                when h.chain = 'aurora' then 'WETH'
                when h.chain = 'avax' then 'AVAX'
                when h.chain = 'bsc' then 'WBNB'
                when h.chain = 'celo' then 'CELO'
                when h.chain = 'cronos' then 'WCRO'
                when h.chain = 'emerald' then 'ROSE'
                when h.chain = 'fantom' then 'WFTM'
                when h.chain = 'fuse' then 'WFUSE'
                when h.chain = 'harmony' then 'ONE'
                when h.chain = 'heco' then 'WHT'
                when h.chain = 'metis' then 'METIS'
                when h.chain = 'moonbeam' then 'WGLMR'
                when h.chain = 'moonriver' then 'MOVR'
                when h.chain = 'optimism' then 'WETH'
                when h.chain = 'polygon' then 'WMATIC'
                when h.chain = 'syscoin' then 'WSYS'
                else null
            end
    WHERE $__timeFilter(h.datetime)
    group by 1,2
)
select 
    datetime as time,
    sum(strategist_amount) as strategist_amount,
    sum(bifi_stakers_amount) as bifi_stakers_amount,
    sum(bifi_treasury_amount) as bifi_treasury_amount
from usd_by_chain_ts
group by 1
order by 1
;

    'WFUSE', -- fuse
    'ONE', -- harmony
    'WHT', -- heco
    'METIS', -- metis
    'WGLMR', -- moonbeam
    'MOVR', -- moonriver
    'WETH', -- optimism
    'WMATIC', -- polygon
    'WSYS' -- syscoin
  )
  and $__timeFilter(datetime)
  group by 1, 2
),
usd_by_chain_ts as (
    SELECT h.datetime, h.chain, 
        sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value) as strategist_amount,
        sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.86) * avg(avg_usd_value) as bifi_stakers_amount,
        sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.14) * avg(avg_usd_value) as bifi_treasury_amount
    FROM
    data_raw.vault_harvest_1d_ts h
        left join price_1d p on p.datetime = h.datetime and p.oracle_id = 
            case 
                when h.chain = 'arbitrum' then 'WETH'
                when h.chain = 'aurora' then 'WETH'
                when h.chain = 'avax' then 'AVAX'
                when h.chain = 'bsc' then 'WBNB'
                when h.chain = 'celo' then 'CELO'
                when h.chain = 'cronos' then 'WCRO'
                when h.chain = 'emerald' then 'ROSE'
                when h.chain = 'fantom' then 'WFTM'
                when h.chain = 'fuse' then 'WFUSE'
                when h.chain = 'harmony' then 'ONE'
                when h.chain = 'heco' then 'WHT'
                when h.chain = 'metis' then 'METIS'
                when h.chain = 'moonbeam' then 'WGLMR'
                when h.chain = 'moonriver' then 'MOVR'
                when h.chain = 'optimism' then 'WETH'
                when h.chain = 'polygon' then 'WMATIC'
                when h.chain = 'syscoin' then 'WSYS'
                else null
            end
    WHERE $__timeFilter(h.datetime)
    group by 1,2
)
select 
    datetime as time,
    sum(sum(strategist_amount)) over (order by datetime) as strategist_amount,
    sum(sum(bifi_stakers_amount)) over (order by datetime) as bifi_stakers_amount,
    sum(sum(bifi_treasury_amount)) over (order by datetime) as bifi_treasury_amount
from usd_by_chain_ts
group by 1
order by 1
;

panels.title: Fees Collected in USD at the price of collection

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1d', h.datetime) as time,
  --sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value) as strategist_usd_amount,
  --sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value)  as beefy_usd_amount,
  --sum(sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as strategist_usd_amount,
  --sum(sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as beefy_usd_amount
  --sum(sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as strategist_wnative_amount,
  --sum(sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.86)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as bifi_stakers_wnative_amount,
  --sum(sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.14)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as bifi_treasury_wnative_amount
    sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) as strategist_wnative_amount,
    sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.86) as bifi_stakers_wnative_amount,
    sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.14) as bifi_treasury_wnative_amount
FROM
  data_raw.vault_harvest_1d_ts h
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(h.datetime)
  and h.chain in ($chain)
group by 1
order by 1

  --sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value) as strategist_usd_amount,
  --sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value)  as beefy_usd_amount,
  --sum(sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as strategist_usd_amount,
  --sum(sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount) * avg(avg_usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as beefy_usd_amount
  sum(sum(h.strategist_wnative_amount) * avg(usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as strategist_wnative_amount,
  sum(sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.86) * avg(usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as bifi_stakers_wnative_amount,
  sum(sum(h.beefy_wnative_amount * 0.14) * avg(usd_value)) over (order by time_bucket('1d', h.datetime)) as bifi_treasury_wnative_amount
FROM
  data_raw.vault_harvest_1d_ts h
     left join price_1d p on p.oracle_id = 
        case 
            when h.chain = 'arbitrum' then 'WETH'
            when h.chain = 'aurora' then 'WETH'
            when h.chain = 'avax' then 'AVAX'
            when h.chain = 'bsc' then 'WBNB'
            when h.chain = 'celo' then 'CELO'
            when h.chain = 'cronos' then 'WCRO'
            when h.chain = 'emerald' then 'ROSE'
            when h.chain = 'fantom' then 'WFTM'
            when h.chain = 'fuse' then 'WFUSE'
            when h.chain = 'harmony' then 'ONE'
            when h.chain = 'heco' then 'WHT'
            when h.chain = 'metis' then 'METIS'
            when h.chain = 'moonbeam' then 'WGLMR'
            when h.chain = 'moonriver' then 'MOVR'
            when h.chain = 'optimism' then 'WETH'
            when h.chain = 'polygon' then 'WMATIC'
            when h.chain = 'syscoin' then 'WSYS'
            else null
        end
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(h.datetime)
  and h.chain in ($chain)
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Fees Collected in USD at the price of collection
